thread.title: Kaabil is daring but he is not a devil says Hrithik Roshan – watch video
thread.title_full: Kaabil is daring but he is not a devil says Hrithik Roshan – watch video

author: Gaurang Chauhan
title: Kaabil is daring but he is not a devil says Hrithik Roshan – watch video
text:
Shah Rukh Khan-Sanjay Leela Bhansali to reunite after 14 years? 
Hrithik Roshan ‘s Kaabil is up for a January 25, 2017 release.BollywoodLife had a fun round with Hrithik Roshan of Google Autocomplete. The Krrish star was game for it and answered every question asked by Google, candidly. Google Autocomplete is basically what general users search most about their favourite superstar. So during the round when in one of the questions he was asked about Kaabil being a daredevil, he very smartly replied that Kaabil is daring but he is not a devil. Kaabil ‘s Rohan is a guy next door, not Daredevil at all. Talking further about the allegations that Kaabil is a remake of certain films, Hrithik very smartly revealed that Kaabil is a remake of the life and times of Sanjay Gupta, the director of the film. He was also very candid about his relationship status. He revealed that he is not dating anyone. His favourite fruit is banana. He also revealed that he is ambidextrous and it’s pretty cool to be ambidextrous. 
So watch the fun round below to know more about Hrithik Roshan, his upcoming film Kaabil and more: 
Hrithik Roshan‘s Kaabil is one of most awaited films of 2017. Be it the trailer, the songs, the dialogues, every aspect of the film has made viewers excited for the film. Apart from the things mentioned above, if one thing that is also being talked about by many is its big box office clash with Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees . It all started when Shah Rukh Khan postponed the release of Raees from Eid 2016 to January 25, 2017 as makers of Kaabil too were up for the same date. Since then a lot has been said about Hrithik Roshan and Shah Rukh Khan’s friendship and the big clash. In the same interview he revealed to me about his equation with Shah Rukh Khan and his take on the Kaabil – Raees clash. Watch that video here . Also read: Hrithik Roshan has an unexpected response to Shah Rukh Khan and the Raees vs Kaabil clash – watch video 
Kaabil reunites Hrithik Roshan with his father Rakesh Roshan as the father-son duo returns to deliver another blockbuster, this time, however, as actor-producer. The film is directed by Sanjay Gupta and stars Yami Gautam, Ronit Roy, Rohit Roy among others.
